articleHow.title: How does the bot generate profit?
body: Our trading bot exploits price gaps between OKX and Binance.
Every two hours it scans both exchanges. When the spread exceeds 3%, it opens a synchronized buy/sell.
Only 10% of your balance is used per trade, reducing exposure to volatility.
Each trade executes in under 50 milliseconds to secure the spread.
Profits are then split equally (3%) among active users, and a small portion funds ongoing development.
